parameters: ?b: the book to be loaded
?c: the cart into which the book will be loaded
?s: the shelf where the book is currently located
?l: the library where the action is taking place
Load a book into a cart.action_desc: This action enables the agent to load a book into a cart. For example, load book_1 into cart_1.
translated_preconditions: the book ?b is on the shelf ?s
the cart ?c is at the shelf ?s
the shelf ?s is in the library ?l
the cart ?c is in the library ?l
translated_effects: the book ?b is not on the shelf ?s
the book ?b is in the cart ?c

parameters: ?b: the book to be unloaded
?c: the cart from which the book is being unloaded
?s: the shelf onto which the book is being unloaded
?l: the library where the action is taking place
Unload a book from a cart.action_desc: This action enables the agent to unload a book from a cart. For example, unload book_1 from cart_1.
translated_preconditions: the book ?b is in the cart ?c
the cart ?c is at the shelf ?s
the cart ?c is in the library ?l
the shelf ?s is in the library ?l
translated_effects: the book ?b is not in the cart ?c
the book ?b is on the shelf ?s

parameters: ?b: the book to be loaded
?v: the van into which the book will be loaded
?s: the shelf from which the book is being loaded
?l: the library where the action is taking place
Load a book into a delivery van.action_desc: This action enables the agent to load a book into a delivery van. For example, load book_1 into van_1.
translated_preconditions: the book ?b is on the shelf ?s
the shelf ?s is in the library ?l
the shelf ?s is the designated delivery hub
the van ?v is at the library ?l
translated_effects: the book ?b is not on the shelf ?s
the book ?b is loaded in the van ?v

parameters: ?b: the book to be unloaded
?v: the van from which the book is being unloaded
?l: the library where the van is located
?s: the delivery hub shelf where the book will be unloaded
Unload a book from a delivery van.action_desc: This action enables the agent to unload a book from a delivery van. For example, unload book_1 from van_1.
translated_preconditions: the book ?b is loaded in van ?v
the van ?v is at library ?l
the shelf ?s is in library ?l
the shelf ?s is the designated delivery hub
translated_effects: the book ?b is not loaded in the van ?v
the book ?b is on the shelf ?s

parameters: ?c - cart
?from - shelf
?to - shelf
?l - library
Push a cart from one shelf to another in.action_desc: This action enables the agent to push a cart from one shelf to another in a library. For example, push cart_1 from shelf_1 to shelf_2 in library_1.
translated_preconditions: the cart ?c is at the shelf ?from
the shelf ?from is in the library ?l
the shelf ?to is in the library ?l
the cart ?c is in the library ?l
the shelf ?from is not the same as the shelf ?to
translated_effects: the cart ?c is not at the shelf ?from
the cart ?c is at the shelf ?to

parameters: ?v - van: the van to be driven
?from - library: the library from which the van departs
?to - library: the library to which the van arrives
Drive a delivery van from one library to.action_desc: This action enables the agent to drive a delivery van from one library's delivery hub to another. The delivery hubs are shelves in the library. For example, drive van_1 from shelf_0 to shelf_1.
translated_preconditions: the van ?v is at the library ?from
the library ?from is not the same as library ?to
translated_effects: the van ?v is not at library ?from
